duties_responsibilities.duty: Welcome and engage with customers, providing friendly and knowledgeable assistance in identifying their beauty needs and recommending products
Maintain a clean, organized, and fully stocked store, including participating in inventory management and merchandising
Facilitate sales transactions and provide exceptional customer service through the entire purchasing process
Promote loyalty programs, current promotions, and in-store events while assisting multiple customers simultaneously
Stay informed about new and existing products, maintaining up-to-date product knowledge to better serve customers
